extendedInfo.description: The Selfloops ANT Service allows applications to connect to smartphone accessories created by Selfloops. The service runs in background when an accessory is plugged to the micro USB port of the smartphone.The accessories use the Android Accessory Protocol to connect to the smartphone.This version of the service works in conjunction with the ANT Radio Service. Therefore, to connect to ANT+ sensors you need to install also the ANT Radio Service.The current product portfolio of Selfloops smartphone accessories include:1) an ANT+ accessory to enable Android smartphones to connect to sensors2) a Weather station with temperature,humidity and barometric sensorsTo know more, see our website: http://www.selfloops.comIf you want to enable ANT+ in your Android device, please read our how-to guide:http://www.selfloops.com/resources/tech-guides.html
